data.comment: The big names in today's match at Weserstadion have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Weserstadion.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Bremen in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Throw-in 1. FC Cologne.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Bremen.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 11, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 14, 1. FC Cologne's Ondrej Duda breaks free at Weserstadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bremen have a goal kick.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 16, 1. FC Cologne are whistled for offside.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Bremen.
In the minute 21, Bremen push forward at Weserstadion and Josh Sargent gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined 1. FC Cologne defence.
Corner awarded to Bremen.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at Weserstadion.
In the minute 22, 1. FC Cologne's Marius Wolf has been booked in Bremen.
In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Omer Toprak (Bremen) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 25, Florian Badstubner awards the away team a throw-in.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 29, In Bremen Bremen attack through Jean-Manuel Mbom. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 31, Jean-Manuel Mbom (Bremen) gets a yellow card.
1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
Florian Badstubner signals a Bremen throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
1. FC Cologne make their first substitution with Ron-Robert Zieler replacing Timo Horn.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne just outside Bremen's area.
In the minute 41, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at Weserstadion.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 43, Can Bremen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside 1. FC Cologne's half?
Throw-in for Bremen in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Florian Badstubner awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Bremen to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Bremen in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne.
Throw-in Bremen.
In the minute 51, 1. FC Cologne drive upfield and Sebastian Andersson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bremen defender.
Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
Florian Badstubner signals a throw-in for 1. FC Cologne, close to Bremen's area.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Bremen.
Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bremen are pushing forward but Milot Rashica's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 54, Florian Badstubner awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bremen in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Throw-in high up the field for Bremen in Bremen.
In the minute 56, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 57, 1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Bremen, Leonardo Bittencourt of Bremen is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 60, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In Bremen, Sebastian Andersson (1. FC Cologne) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Important block from the 1. FC Cologne defence as Leonardo Bittencourt fires in a strike for Bremen.
Bremen's Milot Rashica gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
In the minute 64, Elvis Rexhbecaj is on a sub for Dimitris Limnios for 1. FC Cologne.
In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 65, Rafael Czichos (1. FC Cologne) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The home team replace Milot Rashica with Yuya Osako.
In the minute 66, 1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for 1. FC Cologne close to the penalty box.
Yuya Osako for Bremen has been booked by Florian Badstubner and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 67, Niklas Moisander blunders with an own goal. This makes it 0-1.
Florian Badstubner awards the away team a throw-in.
Florian Badstubner signals a Bremen throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 69, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Free kick for Bremen in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Can Bremen capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Bremen's Leonardo Bittencourt misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 73, Florian Badstubner awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Jan Thielmann is replacing Dominick Drexler for the away team.
Markus Gisdol (1. FC Cologne) is making a fourth substitution, with Jannes Horn replacing Noah Katterbach.
Kevin Mohwald is replacing Omer Toprak for Bremen at Weserstadion.
In the minute 74, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Florian Kohfeldt is making the team's third substitution at Weserstadion with Tahith Chong replacing Jean-Manuel Mbom.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
In the minute 76, Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
1. FC Cologne needs to be cautious. Bremen have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 78, Bremen's Tahith Chong is on target but unsuccessful.
In Bremen, Marco Friedl of Bremen is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tahith Chong (Bremen) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for 1. FC Cologne at Weserstadion.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at Weserstadion.
Throw-in for Bremen close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, An attacking Bremen player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Leonardo Bittencourt levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
Florian Badstubner awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Bremen are in shooting range from this free kick.
Leonardo Bittencourt for Bremen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
Bremen have a dangerous throw-in.
Tahith Chong for Bremen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
Florian Badstubner signals a Bremen throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
Can Bremen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside 1. FC Cologne's half?
Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
Florian Badstubner will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Bremen to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
Bremen's Josh Sargent goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in for Bremen in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
Throw-in high up the field for Bremen in Bremen.
Florian Badstubner blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
